page.title: 16RELIGION SCRAPTOFT THURNBY
page.content: Our religion is mostly Christian,but not many children go to church.I am C of E.but my mother and baby brother are RC.My cousin and I used to go to Sunday School,now she doesn't believe God made the earth because of a programme on 'Tomorrow's World'.We visited All Saints and the vicar told us what the church does for people today.The people who go there are a family,they have a table where they eat bread and drink wine to remember Jesus.The vicar showed me my name in the register.The church warden showed us round the church.We saw the stained glass windows and the font where people are baptised or made members of the church,it is 700 years old.In the graveyard there is an Early English stone cross.I enjoyed the visit.
